A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Defies expectations\, intense battle scenes\, hilarious. A little long\, but I'm not going to argue against more Star Wars and character development. It is the middle chapter of the trilogy so not all questions have to be answered (but now we know where the blue milk comes from).  

I really thought it was great.
